name: Spring Forever (itch)
description:
Embark on an adventure chasing your ethereal pet across the floating island of Spring Forever - A land of not so terrifying creatures, lava pits, fluffy clouds, lots of spikes, deadly bubbles and much more. Come visit!

• Play across 7 handcrafted worlds.

• Simple and intuitive game mechanics.

• 16 outfits to choose for your character.

• Cute and unique enemies.

• 8 cut-scenes.

• 7 trophies to collect.

• Extreme mode.

• Stunning pixel art graphics. 

• Original music.
